ARABIC: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ قُل لِّأَزْوَٰجِكَ إِن كُنتُنَّ تُرِدْنَ ٱلْحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنْيَا وَزِينَتَهَا فَتَعَالَيْنَ أُمَتِّعْكُنَّ وَأُسَرِّحْكُنَّ سَرَاحًا جَمِيلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: O Prophet, tell your wives: 'If you desire the life of the dunya and its finery, come and I will give you all you need and release you with kindness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O Prophet, say to your wives: "In case you desire the life and pomp of this world, come, I will provide you handsomely, and let you go with a grace.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: O Prophet, tell your wives: “If you seek the world and its embellishments, then come and I will make some provision for you and release you in an honourable way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Prophet, tell your wives, "If you want the worldly life and its beauty, I shall allow you to enjoy it and set you free in an honorable manner,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: O Herald of the Hidden! Say to your wives, “If you desire the worldly life and its adornment – therefore come, I shall give you wealth and a befitting release!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O Prophet! Say to your wives: "If you desire the life of this world, and its glitter, then come! I will make a provision for you and set you free in a handsome manner."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O Prophet! say to your wives: If you desire this world's life and its adornment, then come, I will give you a provision and allow you to depart a goodly departing
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O Prophet, say to thy wives: 'If you desire the present life and its adornment, come now, I will make you provision, and set you free with kindliness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O Prophet! Say unto thy wives: If ye desire the world's life and its adornment, come! I will content you and will release you with a fair release.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: O Prophet, say to your wives, "If you seek the life of this world and all its finery then come, I will make provision for you, and release you honourably.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Prophet! say unto thy wives: if it be that ye seek the world's life and the adornment thereof, then come I shall make a provision for you and I shall release you with a handsome release.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O Prophet! Say to your wives, ‘If you desire the life of the world and its glitter, come, I will provide for you and release you in a graceful manner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O Prophet! Say to thy Consorts: "If it be that ye desire the life of this World, and its glitter,- then come! I will provide for your enjoyment and set you free in a handsome manner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O Prophet (Muhammad SAW)! Say to your wives: If you desire the life of this world, and its glitter, Then come! I will make a provision for you and set you free in a handsome manner (divorce).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: O Prophet, say to your wives: 'If you seek this life and its finery, come, I will release you with a fine release.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O Prophet! Say to your wives, “If you desire the life of this world and its finery, then let me compensate you, and release you kindly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: O Prophet, say to your wives, "If you should desire the worldly life and its adornment, then come, I will provide for you and give you a gracious release.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [33:28] O Prophet! Say to your wives: — who were nine, and they had asked him for some of the adornments of this world, which he did not possess — ‘If you desire the life of this world and its adornment, come [now], I will provide for you, in other words, the compensation [to be provided] for divorce, and release you in a gracious manner, I will divorce you and will not coerce [you to stay].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (O Prophet!) i.e. Muhammad (pbuh) (Say unto thy wives: If ye desire the world's life) what is in the life of this world (and its adornment) and its splendour, (come! I will content you) with divorce (and will release you with a fair release) according to the Sunnah.
